sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, BarChart, Bar, Legend } from 'recharts'; // Mock data - replace with actual API calls later const employeeData = [ { month: 'Jan', count: 150 }, { month: 'Feb', count: 160 }, { month: 'Mar', count: 165 }, { month: 'Apr', count: 175 }, { month: 'May', count: 180 }, { month: 'Jun', count: 190 } ]; const absenceData = [ { month: 'Jan', sickDays: 12, vacationDays: 15 }, { month: 'Feb', sickDays: 8, vacationDays: 10 }, { month: 'Mar', sickDays: 15, vacationDays: 8 }, { month: 'Apr', sickDays: 10, vacationDays: 12 }, { month: 'May', sickDays: 7, vacationDays: 18 }, { month: 'Jun', sickDays: 9, vacationDays: 22 }, ]; const departmentData = [ { name: 'Engineering', employees: 45 }, { name: 'Sales', employees: 30 }, { name: 'Marketing', employees: 25 }, { name: 'HR', employees: 15 }, { name: 'Finance', employees: 20 } ]; const recentActivities = [ { id: 1, type: 'hire', user: 'John Smith', department: 'Engineering', date: '2024-12-28' }, { id: 2, type: 'transfer', user: 'Sarah Johnson', department: 'Sales', date: '2024-12-27' }, { id: 3, type: 'promotion', user: 'Mike Brown', department: 'Marketing', date: '2024-12-26' }, ]; const Dashboard: React.FC = () => { return (
{/* Header */}

Dashboard

Welcome to Nova HCM. Here's what's happening in your organization.

{/* Metrics Cards */}
Total Employees
190
Departments
5
New Hires (This Month)
12
Growth Rate
5.2%
{/* Charts */}

Employee Growth

Employees by Department

{/* Absence Trend Chart */}

Absence Trends

{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

    {recentActivities.map((activity) => (

  • {activity.user}

    {activity.date}

    {activity.type === 'hire' && 'Joined'} {activity.type === 'transfer' && 'Transferred to'} {activity.type === 'promotion' && 'Promoted in'}{' '} {activity.department}

    • ))}
); }; export default Dashboard;
